channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le Garmin Edge 850, nouvelle référence des compteurs vélo GPS, est déjà à prix cassé
item.description: Si vous faites souvent du vélo et que vous souhaitez avoir un suivi précis de vos sorties, tracés et efforts, vous avez le compteur GPS Garmin Edge 850 en promo à 499,99 euros au lieu de 549,99 euros sur Alltricks.

item.title: OpenAI shares more details about its agreement with the Pentagon
item.description: By CEO Sam Altman’s own admission, OpenAI’s deal with the Department of Defense was “definitely rushed,” and “the optics don’t look good.”

item.title: Forget cold showers after a workout — according to an exercise scientist, 'the evidence to support that in terms of muscle regeneration is really lacking'
item.description: Cold plunges are all the rage, but heat is your real post-workout friend.

item.title: I can’t recommend this Dell 15.6-inch FHD Laptop deal highly enough — it’s a seriously capable Windows 11 work-from-anywhere machine for under $500
item.description: This Dell 15.6" FHD laptop checks all the right boxes for work or home use, pairing a Ryzen 7 processor with 16GB of RAM and a spacious 1TB SSD.

item.title: Le spatial européen a un talon d'Achille que personne ne regarde, cet expert français le pointe du doigt
item.description: Aujourd'hui, nous vous invitons à découvrir un aspect souvent méconnu mais crucial du secteur spatial : le segment sol et la gestion des données spatiales. À l'ère du New Space, la question de l'accès aux données s'impose comme un enjeu majeur. Dans un contexte de dépendance marquée aux...

item.title: Lego’s Smart Brick is here, and it transforms these new Star Wars sets
item.description: Lego's new Smart Brick is a pretty big deal. It packs a miniature computer, a microphone, and NFC tech into a classic 2×4 Lego brick, which can power all sorts of new experiences with select sets. It has so much promise that we awarded it "best in show" at CES 2026, and now, eight Star […]

item.title: 'The goal was always to create engaging and varied content that supported players ideas and stories, not historical realism' — The Sims 4’s lead game designer talks Royalty and Legacy
item.description: The Sims 4's Lead Game Designer Xènia Peña talks all things nobility in the latest expansion pack, Royalty and Legacy.

item.title: The 'dream OLED' TV tech upgrade may finally be on the way — CEO says it will improve 'efficiency, lifespan and color purity', and it's readying production
item.description: South Korean OLED manufacturer Lordin says it's secured manufacturing capacity for its blue PhOLED display technology

item.title: What Happens if Iran Shuts Down the Strait of Hormuz?
item.description: The Strait of Hormuz is one of the most sensitive pressure points in the global economy. Conflict in Iran could put it at risk indefinitely.

item.title: Nine Inch Nails Has a New ‘Tron: Ares’ Soundtrack to Rock Out To
item.description: New songs and some flashy new remixes of the original score await your ears in 'Tron Ares: Divergence.'

item.title: Honor says its ‘Robot phone’ with moving camera can dance to music
item.description: Honor first teased its “Robot phone” with a movable camera arm earlier this year. Ahead of the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona, the Chinese company provided more details about the device, including how the robot can respond to different situations without commands. The company said that it is planning to launch this device in […]

item.title: Honor launches its new slim foldable Magic V6 with a 6,600 mAh battery
item.description: Honor also previewed battery tech that could take foldable batteries over 7,000 mAh mark

item.title: Elle a la suspension d’une Ferrari mais coûte 16 000 € : le secret de cette nouvelle électrique chinoise, la Deepal L07
item.description: Dans le cadre de mes recherches sur la conduite autonome en Chine, je me suis rendu chez Deepal où j’ai pu découvrir la suspension magnétorhéologique. Je vous en dis plus.

item.title: Soundcore’s New Headphones Have an Absurd Battery Life for the Price
item.description: The ANC is supposed to be able to block out jet engines, too.

item.title: Soundcore’s Space 2 are an evolution of its budget headphones
item.description: We finally have an update to the Soundcore Space One that launched two and a half years ago. At MWC 2026, Soundcore has announced the Space 2, which will be available in the US on April 21st in three colors - linen white, jet black, and seafoam green - for $129.99. That's $30 more than […]

item.title: With new Dead or Alive and Virtua Fighter projects in the works, there’s just one thing missing before we have a full 3D fighting game renaissance
item.description: I’m stoked about the return of Dead or Alive and Virtua Fighter, but another 3D fighting game series is long overdue a return.

item.title: Soundcore's popular budget headphones have finally received a follow-up — with a price hike
item.description: Anker expands its headphone line-up

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, March 2 (game #1498)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Modernization-led cloud migration: The missing step in seizing the AI opportunity
item.description: How businesses can master migration-led migration, including key steps like mapping and securing long-term governance.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, March 2 (game #995)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, March 2 (game #729)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: A closer look at Honor’s Robot Phone
item.description: While Honor has already made plenty of product announcements, with tablets, foldables and more, its most interesting device at MWC 2026 is the Robot Phone — and maybe the humanoid robot that came alongside it. After briefly showing off a model at CES, Honor isn't quite ready to launch its Robot Phone. However, we got more specs, tech demos and a closer look following the company's MWC press event in Barcelona. The Robot Phone is currently set to launch later this year. Image by Mat Smith for Engadget Honor has put a lot of effort into ensuring its camera gimbal is highly mobile, to the point...

item.title: Photo de la semaine : ce couple d'étoiles massives vit ses derniers instants, et l'image est saisissante
item.description: En plein cœur de notre photo de la semaine, deux énigmatiques points noirs nimbés d’un étrange halo jaune orangé. Des astres à l’agonie sculptant leur tombeau cosmique ? C’est ce que cette folle image du Very Large Telescope (VLT, Chili) a permis de découvrir…

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude rises to No. 1 in the App Store following Pentagon dispute
item.description: Anthropic’s chatbot Claude seems to have benefited from the attention around the company’s fraught negotiations with the Pentagon.
